result.title: Discussion on problem 705-C Round 366 Div 2
result.content:
• This Discussion for anyone face a problem to solve this problem or anyone can't solve it :
  • initially we have 3 types of operations -
  • first one
  • we add one notification at specific application m[y]++
  • and increase unread message newM++
  • and save this application number at array of query type 1 qt1[sz]=y -
  • second one
  • we read all notification of specific application m[y]=0
  • and decrease unread message by all unread notification of this application newM-=m[y]
  • and update that at this application all previous queries will be deleted u[y]=sz -
  • third one
  • we will loop from last iteration of unread messages to number of mesage will be read
  • if we have any number of message at this application of this query and we haven't any update by option 2
  • we can read message and decrse it from unread message
  • decrase newM , m[qt1[i]] -
  • after finish loop last iterator will be max with this iterator of number of mesage will be read -
  • at each time we will print current unread message
  • solution can be like that : http://codeforces.com/contest/705/submission/19709969
